subject: Do you ship to Turkey?
description_text:
And if you do is there customs clearence issues where buyers from Turkey 
have to pay a lot of money to get it cleared?

conversations.body_text: 您好，我们可以发货到土耳其，但无法确认是否需要缴纳关税。之前的客户没有向我们提出过这个问题；他们通常要求我们申报较低的价值。
Hello, we can ship to Turkey, though we cannot confirm whether customs duties will apply. Previous customers have not raised this issue with us; they typically request that we declare lower values.
